attributes.action: make it law everyone has to wear face mask/face shield,
attributes.additional_details: I want the goverment to make it so people who dont care can say yer i not need a mask and not have to show proof, also a shield covers their face and stops their cough or sneez hitting others make it so shop security and schools can demand see proof and make them use face shields
attributes.background: i want for the goverment to use its brain and say every one must use face protection. a mask covers nose and mouth a shield does not but it does protect others from corvid coughs, and make it law people who have exemption certificate must wear shield.
